summary: This is my personal version of the UNP model that I use when I play Skyrim. It has about an A cup rack, skinny waist and a nice bubble butt. Weight slider is now supported.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/3076419-1434778811.jpg[/img]
You are responsible for downloading and installing this mod. You should back up your ygNord mesh and texture folders before installation in case you don't like this mod. If you screw something up, it's on you.

[img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/3076419-1434778862.jpg[/img]
This is a custom variation of the UNP model. It has a skinny waist with an "A" cup rack and a nice bubble butt. The weight slider makes the body the zero size for the UNP Main version with slightly altered wrists, neck and ankles to match the games default TRI files. All credit goes to Dimonized, all I did was move some vertices around to suit my personal tastes.

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/3076419-1434778913.jpg[/img]
FILE : UNPetite
1. Download with NMM and install or drag and drop the files into your data folder.

-AND/OR-

(Only install the following if you use ECE and want your ygNord race to use this body type.)
FILE: UNPetite - ECE
1. Install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit[/url].
2. Install this mod and click yes to "Overwrite All".
3. Create a character using the ygNord Race provided by Enhanced Character Edit. I also recommend making the characters neck a little thinner as it looks better then the default width with this body type.
4. Enjoy.

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/3076419-1434778964.jpg[/img]
- This body uses the default UNP model, all I did was move some vertices around. This means that the body is compatible with any UNP texture replacer.
1. [url=http://nightasymodding.weebly.com/unp-or-unpetite---hmm-what-to-wear.html]UNP or UNPetite - Hmm What To Wear[/url] (You'll want to download the file labeled 03 - UNPetite)
2. [url=http://nightasymodding.weebly.com/unp-or-unpetite---snap-up-booty-shorts-and-top.html]UNP or UNPetite - Snap Up Booty Shorts and Top[/url]
3. [url=http://nightasymodding.weebly.com/unp-or-unpetite---swat-hottie.html]UNP or UNPetite - SWAT Hottie[/url]

7. [url=http://nightasymodding.weebly.com/unp-or-unpetite---leather-cami-and-boy-shorts.html]UNP or UNPetite - Leather Cami and Boy Shorts[/url]

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/3076419-1435107647.jpg[/img]

Dimonized for creating the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D6709%26preview%3D&pUp=1]UNP model[/url].
ECE Team (Nothing from this mod is from ECE but I set it up to replace their ygNord races body.)

author: Nightasy
